D

display() - Method in class Field
This method displays the field on the terminal.
displayGUI() - Method in class GUI
Main GUI initialization's method for the main frame, it displays the menu, the time elapsed the current score, the restart button, and display the field at the beginning (with hidden boxes) on the frame.
displayMenu() - Method in class GUI
Displays the menu bar for choosing between multiple difficulties and display their informations.
displayScore() - Method in class GUI
Displays the current score of the player on the main frame.
displayStartEmptyField() - Method in class GUI
Restarts and displays the grid field with hidden boxes and add the start ActionListener on each of them to know where to start the game, in order to trigger the initializationField() method on a specific box.
